theStormbringer:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theStormbringer:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theStormbringer:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theStormbringer:CrackedIris.NAME: Super Luck
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b2 skills in a single turn, gain #b3 Vigor

theStormbringer:KineticGenerator.NAME: Kinetic Generator
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b2 Basic Strikes, Defends or non-Ruinteller cards gain #b1 #yColorless #ythestormbringer:Mana

theStormbringer:Nanab.NAME: Nanab Berry
theStormbringer:Nanab.FLAVOR: A bitter-sweet fruit from the world you called home. Strange to see it here.
DESCRIPTIONS: On the first turn of combat gain 4 #yVigor and #yHydration
